identity.name: WineStudy
identity.aesthetic: Old World Charm meets Modern SaaS

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all H1-H3. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Font weight 600 or 700.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all UI text, inputs, and long-form reading. Line height relaxed (1.6).
usage_rules.accent: Use Cormorant Garamond Italic for tasting notes, quotes, and 'sommelier tips'.

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise texture overlay on the background (opacity 0.03) to simulate paper.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-border/60 for cards. No heavy borders.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-sm (2px) or rounded-md (6px). Avoid fully rounded 'pill' shapes for containers, keep them editorial/rectangular.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md with bg-white/80 (light) or bg-black/60 (dark) for sticky headers.

layout_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense, data-rich, but with elegant typography.
layout_strategies.atlas: Full-screen map interface with floating side-panel for details.
layout_strategies.study_mode: Single column, wide margins (max-w-2xl), focus mode (distraction-free).
layout_strategies.tasting_diary: Form-based, but styled like a physical notebook. Input fields should look like lines on paper or clean minimal boxes.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm px-8 py-6 font-serif tracking-wide uppercase text-sm
buttons.secondary: border border-primary/20 bg-transparent hover:bg-primary/5 text-primary rounded-sm px-8 py-6 font-serif tracking-wide uppercase text-sm

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.content: Padding p-6 or p-8. Always use serif for the card title.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 py-3 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 font-body

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: Run 'yarn add framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge' immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'wine', 'paper', and 'gold' colors defined in the palette. Add the font families.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Update index.css to set the CSS variables for the new palette. Ensure dark mode variables are also set.
4. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts link to public/index.html.
5. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default rounded-md to rounded-sm or rounded-none where appropriate to match the 'Editorial' aesthetic.
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Use framer-motion for page transitions and subtle hover effects on cards (e.g., slight lift + shadow increase).
7. NOISE TEXTURE: Create a global 'NoiseOverlay' component that adds a fixed, pointer-events-none, low-opacity noise texture to the entire app for that 'paper' feel.
8. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are mandatory.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
